synopsis.text: Ever since childhood, Botan Negoro has prepared for a vital mission - to collect the mysterious Tesla Shards that have been appearing worldwide. These fragments unleash chaos with their supernatural powers. If assembled, they could grant unbelievable power. To gain an edge, Botan joins forces with the loud-mouthed agent Kuruma. Multiple covert organizations also seek the Tesla Shards, aiming to exploit their force before the shards fall into enemy hands. Can Botan and Kuruma successfully locate all of the powerful pieces in this thrilling race against time? Their quest leads them on a globe-trotting adventure filled with intrigue. More than the fate of the world hangs in the balance - so too does the legacy of the ingenious Nikola Tesla.
